name: The Halloween Party
description:
Leonard would have never expected that going to that party would have changed his life forever.

This is a short adventure game made for the $104 Adventure Game Challenge (13-27 September 2020) whose theme was: a delusion.

Mouse click to interact, F5 to save, F7 to load, F9 restarts the game.

Suggested graphics settings: keep nearest-neighbour as scaling method. It's a pixel art game, interpolation would make everything look horrible.
